metadata.title: CVE-2016-9959 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
game-music-emu before 0.6.1 allows remote attackers to generate out ofbounds 8-bit values.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-9959` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libgme0 - 0.6.0-3ubuntu0.16.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: game-music-emu package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.6.0-3ubuntu0.16.04.1').
